system.description: The character is not human and probably not from Earth or at least Earth-616. The Marvel Multiverse features all sorts of different alien races. The most common of these—Kree, Skrulls and so on—have their own entries. If the character doesn't fit one of those, then this origin applies.
system.examples: Devil Dinosaur, Gamora, Groot, Rocket Raccoon.

system.description: The character or at least one of their ancestors is not from Earth. Pick an alien race that they belong to. If they were not raised on Earth, they should consider taking the Outsider occupation.

The character looks very different than the average person (wherever they happen to be) and cannot easily hide their identity. When this tag appears in origins in this chapter, it may give other useful information, like whether an extreme appearance is common.
